raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

1. The 10 pM IFNα2 dose was chosen because it corresponds to the IFNα2 EC50 on both cell lines.
2. The 1 pM IFNβ dose was chosen because it corresponds to the IFNβ EC50 on both cell lines.
3. PBMCs were isolated over ficoll gradient (histopaque-1077, Sigma-Aldrich) from blood samples of healthy donors. Cells were left untreated or were incubated for 15 minutes with 50 pM of human IFNα2 in the absence or presence of 10 μg/ml of the 2HCD25 nanobody—IFNα2-R120E fusion protein.

Note that there are limited sentences that meet the criteria, as the text primarily focuses on methods and descriptions rather than quantitative bioactivity data.
